definition[0]: an arrangement to meet someone at a particular time and place, often secretly
example[1]: He made a rendezvous with her in Times Square.
definition[1]: a place where two or more people have arranged to meet
example[2]: Boats picked us up at pre-arranged rendezvous.
definition[2]: a bar, restaurant etc where people like to meet
example[3]: a popular rendezvous for media people
definition[3]: to meet someone at a time or place that was arranged earlier
example[4]: Weâ€™ll rendezvous with James in Nicosia.
definition[4]: if two spacecraft, aircraft, or military vehicles rendezvous, they meet, for example to move supplies from one to the other
